name: Angus Council
membership: Angus Council is a member of the Dundee and Angus Chamber of Commerce, Federation of Small Businesses.
goal: To support local people, businesses and organisations in Angus, a new Economic Strategy has been produced which runs from 2014 â€“ 2020 and includes priorities including supporting Enterprise and Infrastructure, supporting Pride in Place, supporting Communities and supporting Skills. The strategy is available to view at www.anguscouncil.gov.uk under Economic Development.
interests: Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise
euInitiatives: Angus Council is currently engaged on projects with the SRDP, ERDF,ESF and INTERREG programmes. We have a partnership called East of Scotland European Coalition which requires support in Brussels and includes familiarisations visits.
